posts.post_content:
I have a McElveen Tolstoi graded PSA 1 that has great eye appeal despite the grade.  The PSA registry only shows 3 of these cards graded by PSA.  I’m open to trade this rare card for some of the remaining off backs (no Piedmonts or Sweet Caps) needed for my T206 binder...

     Ball - fielding
     Becker
     Burch - batting
     Lundgren - chicago
     Reulbach - glove

Please PM of you have any of the above and interest in my McElveen.  

Thanks!
Joe
